name: Pages of Arkham
description:
A (sadly) incomplete project based on the works by H.P. Lovecraft. Combine different magic syllables into powerful spells to defeat eldritch horrors. But beware, for ancient magic drains you of your sanity.

(There are only three enemies right now, and no end goal. Sorry!)

W to move forward, A/D to turn around. Control arrows are okay, too.

Created for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021

Music by Eric Matyas
